subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: The British skipper Jonny Malbon retired from the Vendée Globe round-the-world race because of a tear in his mainsail, becoming the 16th sailor to abandon the solo competition.
snippet: The British skipper Jonny Malbon retired from the Vendée Globe round-the-world race because of a tear in his mainsail, becoming the 16th sailor to abandon the solo competition.
